answers.answer: Hi.Are you under a lot of stress?  Do you have any tooth pain or sinus issues?  Im not positive, but I think bruising is related to "anemia"?  Sounds like you may have some anxiety from all the pain.  Hope you feel better!
You need to go to your doctor - some of your symptoms point to diabetes.please make an immediate appointment
yeah i have tooth pain and sinus pain. I went to the doctor and she took my blood, see how it goes from there. thank you.
It sounds to me like maybe Fibromyalgia, Fibro can mimic all kinds of trouble. Also, I would get checked for diabetes.

question: i have bad abdominal pain, sometimes i feel like its a stabbing pain and sometimes its like a throbbing pain. my appetite has changed, i drink plenty of water yet im always thirsty and go to the toilet more often the usual. i have constant headaches, jaw aches and back pains. my hands sometimes shake and get this tingly feeling and i feel like throwing up.i feel dizzy and fatigue. i bruise really easy and my hairs falling out. whats wrong with me ?
title: is this serious?
